author: Player

review: It is not very friendly with iPads and has not achieved streaming activity
author: Graham Jasper

review: I just installed this device in a television in Europe. The Wi-Fi router seemed pretty decent. The internet speed was approximately 25/5 (download/upload). Worked right out of the box with a Nexus 7 tablet. Setup was much easier than I expected.I also tried the Chromecast app for iPhone. Connecting my iPhone 5S to Chromecast was simple, but the process of sending images and video was less intuitive than when I used the Nexus 7.This is a good device for sending image/video from an Android device to a television or monitor, even for a novice who understands how to find a Wi-Fi- router and enter the network password.
author: Westchester

review: amazing product. every house in america should have one
